page.title: 16 GARAGE
page.content: THE GARAGE HAS BEEN HERE FOR ROUGHY FIFTY FIVE YEARS.THEY SELL SECOND HAND AND NEW CARS.MOST OF THEIR NEW CARS ARE ITALIAN.THEY HAVE A BIG SERVICE BAY WHICH CAN SERVICE ABOUT FIVE CARS AT A TIME EVEN THOUGH THEY ONLY HAVE SEVEN MEMBERS OF STAFF.THE GARAGE IS OPEN AT EIGHT am TO NINE pm.THE GARAGE IS A LOCAL FIRM AND IS OWNED BY MR.SHEER.THE GARAGE ALSO OFFERS A BREAKDOWN RECOVERY SERVICE.IT HAS TWO PETROL PUMPS WHICH PUMPS OUT SHELL OIL.THEY DONT HAVE A SHOP SELLING CIGARETTES OR SWEETS ETC. THEY HAVE,A SHOP SELLING CAR MATERIALS. THEY ALSO DO A M.O.T.AS WELL.THE GARAGE IS A SELF SERVICE GARAGE WHICH MEANS YOU PUT THE PETROL IN TO YOUR OWN CAR AND THEN PAY WHO'S EVER IS ON THE TILL.THE GARAGE HAD ABOUT FIFTY CARS TO SELL MOST OF THEM BEING NEW.
